doc:
Robert Mandan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Mandan 0 Robert Mandan (February 2, 1932 – April 29, 2018) was an American actor, best known for his role as Chester Tate, the womanizing businessman husband of Jessica Tate (Katherine Helmond) on the satirical sitcom Soap from 1977–81. Robert_Mandan ( February_2_,_1932 – April_29_,_2018 ) was an_American_actor , best_known for his_role as Chester_Tate , the_womanizing_businessman_husband of Jessica_Tate ( Katherine_Helmond ) on the_satirical_sitcom Soap from 1977 – 81 .
